description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're bringing our talks online!

Speakers:

🗣 Dylan Meeus - Getting started with Audio Programming

Dylan will talk about the basics of audio programming, and then using GoAudio to alleviate some of the hard work. GoAudio is an audio processing library written in 100% Go.

Dylan is a software engineer working to improve AI infrastructure at dploy.ai using Go as part of his day job. In addition he contributes to open source software and maintains both Hasgo and GoAudio.

⏰ Schedule:

- 18:00-18:15 intro/welcome
- 18:15-18:45 first speaker
- 18:45-19:15 second speaker
- 19:15-19:30 workshop intro for next month/farewell/feedback

📣 We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout! As you can see, our pun game especially is in dire need of a

📣Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

📍 - Online
title: Go(ne online) - Audio Programming
